Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: khx saban dwy dwngdaw meux man khlxy tklng ma
shay (muhammad) khxng phwk cea midi hlng phid læa cheux man nı thang thi phid
læa khea midi phud tam xarmn
sing(thi khea phud)nan michı xun dı nxkcak pen wa hiyˌ thi thuk prathan lng ma
phuthrng phlang xanac xan makmay (yib ril) di sxn khea
phuthrng phlang xan khængræng dangnan khea cung prakt nı sphaph thithæ cring
khna thi khea xyu bn khxb fa xan sungsng
læw khea di khea ma kıl læa khea ma kıl cn chid
khea khea ma kıl (cn xyu) nı raya khxng play khan thnu thang sxng hrux kıl kwa nan xik
dangnan khea (yib ril) cung na wa hiyˌ ma hı kæ baw khxng phraxngkh (muhammad)sing thi khea ca na wa hiyˌ ma
citcı (khxng muhammad) midi ptiseth sing thi khea di hen
læw phwk cea ca totheiyng kab khea keiyw kab sing thi khea di hen xik hrux
læa doy nænxn khea di hen yib ril nı kar lng ma xik khrang hnung
n thi tn phuthra xan kil phon
n thi nan khux swn swrrkh xanpen thi phanak
(khna nan) sing thi pkkhlum (sæng prakay) di pkkhlum tn phuthra
sayta (khxng muhammad) midi heluxb læ pi thang xun læa midi lwngkein pi
doy nænxn khea di hen sayyan xan ying hıy khxng phracea khxng khea
læw phwk cea mi di hen xal lat læa xal xus sa
læa taw xun khux taw thi sam, ma nat dxk hrux
sahrab phwk cea mi phes chay læa sahrab phraxngkh phes hying kranan hrux
dusi nan penkar bæng swn thi mi yutithrrm

hela ni michı xun dı nxkcak pen chux thi phwk cea læa brrphburusʹ khxng phwk cea tang man khun ma xe ngxallxhˌ midi thrng prathan hlakthan xan dı lng ma keiyw kab reuxng nan ley phwk khea midi ptibati tam sing dı nxkcak kar khad khane læa sing thi xa rmn prath na læa doy nænxn næwthang thi thuk txng (hi da yahˌ)cak phracea khxng phwk khea di mi mayang phwk khea læw
hrux wa sahrab mnusʹy nan ca di thuk sing thi khea prarthna
(Xanac nan) pen krrmsiththi khx ngxallxhˌ thang nı prlok læa lok ni

læa ma lak kimaknxy nı chan fa thanghlay nan ka rcha faxahˌ khxng phwk khea ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı (kæ phwk khea)wentæ hlang ca kxallxhˌ ca thrng xnumati kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa thrng phx phrathay
